subject: Steroids
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Memphis Grizzlies guard O. J. Mayo said he believed a drink bought at a gas station contained dehydroepiandrosterone, the substance that led to his 10-game suspension from the league.
snippet: Memphis Grizzlies guard O. J. Mayo said he believed a drink bought at a gas station contained dehydroepiandrosterone, the substance that led to his 10-game suspension from the league.
